metadata.title: CVE-2024-35950 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/client: Fully protect modes[] with dev->mode_config.mutexThe modes[] array contains pointers to modes on the connectors'mode lists, which are protected by dev->mode_config.mutex.Thus we need to extend modes[] the same protection or by thetime we use it the elements may already be pointing tofreed/reused memory.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
